actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish additional Under Secretary and Assistant Secretary positions within the Department of Energy.

summary.text: Amends the Department of Energy Organization Act to establish additional Under Secretary and Assistant Secretary positions within the Department of Energy.

titles.title: A bill to establish additional Under Secretary and Assistant Secretary positions within the Department of Energy.
